metadata.title: CVE-2018-17983 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
cext/manifest.c in Mercurial before 4.7.2 has an out-of-bounds read duringparsing of a malformed manifest entry.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17983` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
mercurial-common - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mercurial package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1+esm1').
